reviewText: This could have been such a great platform to discuss healing cancer and other chronic diseases. It was not however, as the grandson--Howard Straus spoke in his mother's place.  He was not dynamic, and did not seem comfortable speaking.  It takes real conviction in addition to facts and figures to convey your message, and this was not the case in this video.

Anyone interested in better health would be well served to read everything you can on the Gerson Therapy.
 I was shocked, pleasantly, that the more people you speak to on this topic the more people you find have already embraced this life. While we do not suffer cancer...we do want to live as healthy as possible .
